attributes.title: Spam

attributes.review: According to all known laws of aviation, there is no way a bee should be able to fly. It’s wings are too small to get its fat little body off the ground. The bee of course flies anyway. Because bees do not care what humans think is possible. ✨💞🥰💅🏼🎀💓🌸💖

attributes.review: When I was downloading the app, my phone suddenly shut off. I would not recommend the app at all. I think the app might have a virus that completely ruins your phone.

attributes.review: The absolute worst app. It crashed my iPhone numerous times after taking forever to download. Horrible software and horrible content. I wish I could rate it 0 stars. DON’T DOWNLOAD!
attributes.title: Do not download this app!

attributes.review: No, seriously. Supporting Donald Trump leads to American lives lost. His COVID response and over all handling of the pandemic has lead to Americans dead, broke, and hopeless. He is draining the life out of America and we can’t take another 4 years.

attributes.title: Tiktok 😘💅
